description.fr: Vaincre tous les Bworks. \--- Lorsqu'un {Summoning:406!} meurt\_: Invoque une {Summoning:670} dans votre équipe. \--- Lorsqu'un {Summoning:429!} achève une {Summoning:670!}\_: Il se transforme en {Summoning:406!}.
description.en: Defeat all the Bworks. \--- When one {Summoning:406!} dies: Summons one {Summoning:670} on your team. \--- When one {Summoning:429!} finishes off one {Summoning:670!}: Turns into a {Summoning:406!}.
description.es: Vencer a todos los bworks. \--- Cuando un {Summoning:406!} muere: Invoca una {Summoning:670} en tu equipo. \--- Cuando un {Summoning:429!} remata a una {Summoning:670!}: Se transforma en {Summoning:406!}.
description.de: Alle Bworks besiegen. \--- Wenn ein\_{Summoning:406!} stirbt: Beschwört ein\_{Summoning:670} in deinem Team. \--- Wenn ein\_{Summoning:429!} ein\_{Summoning:670!} tötet: Verwandelt sich in einen\_{Summoning:406!}.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Bworks. \--- Quando um {Summoning:406!} morre: Invoca uma {Summoning:670} na sua equipe. \--- Quando um {Summoning:429!} derrota uma {Summoning:670!}: Ele se transforma em {Summoning:406!}.
